content: **knitted top in drops paris the piece is worked with textured pattern sizes xs xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no w-827 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 200-250-250-300-300-350 g colour 66 plum **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 23 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 5 mm length 60 cm or 80 cm for stocking stitch drops circular needle size 4 mm length 60 cm or 80 cm for rib needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
